The Leading Manufactory of

Vocuum Valves

Since 1997, Dazhong Valve adheres to the user core value of "eAdoption, Innovation and Duration", and is committed to providing customers with high-quality and high-value-added valve and fluid intelligent control products and services. We have established a corporate culture and brand value system and have many years of experience in the production and service of control valves. Our company specializes in providing various types of high-vacuum butterfly valves, high-vacuum ball valves, ultra-high vacuum plug valves, high-vacuum diaphragm valves, high-vacuum gate valves, electromagnetic vacuum valves, and other valve products.
